Translations.Text: Aur jab hum kissi aayat ki jagah doosri aayat badal detay hain aur jo kuch Allah Taalaa nazil farmata hai ussay woh khoob janta hai to yeh kehtay hain kay tu to bohtan baaz hai. Baat yeh hai kay inn mein say aksar jantay hi nahi
Keh dijiye kay issay aap kay rab ki taraf say jibraeel haq kay sath ley ker aaye hain takay eman walon ko Allah Taalaa istaqamat ata farmaye aur musalmanon ki rehnumaee aur bisharat ho jaye
Humen bakhoobi ilm hai kay yeh kafir kehtay hain kay issay to aik aadmi sikhata hai uss ki zaban jiss ki taraf yeh nisbat ker rahey hain ajami hai aur yeh quran to saaf arabi mein hai
Jo log Allah Taalaa ki aayaton per eman nahi rakhtay unhen Allah ki taraf say bhi rehnumaee nahi hoti aur unn kay liye alam naak azab hain
Jhoot iftra to wohi bandhtay hain jinhen Allah Taalaa ki aayaton per eman nahi hota. Yehi log jhootay hain

Jo shaks apney eman kay baad Allah say kufur keray ba-juz uss kay jiss per jabar kiya jaye aur uss ka dil eman per bar qarar ho magar jo log khullay dil say kufur keren to unn per Allah ka ghazab hai aur unhi kay liye boht bara azab hai
Yeh iss liye kay enhon ney duniya ki zindagi ko aakhirat per ziyada mehboob rakgha. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa kafir logon ko raah-e-raast nahi dikhata
Yeh woh log hain jin kay dilon per aur jin kay kanon per aur jin ki aankhon per Allah ney mohar laga di hai aur yehi log ghafil hain
Kuch shak nahi kay yehi log aakhirat mein sakht nuksan uthaney walay hain
Jin logon ney fitnon mein dalay janey kay baad hijrat ki phir jihad kiya aur sabar ka saboot diya be-shak tera perwerdigar inn baton kay baad unhen bakhshney wala aur meharbaniyan kerney wala hai
